resources.string: Place your card on a flat, non-metallic surface then place a phone on top leaving sensor accessible for finger print scanning.
Place the card on a flat, non-metallic surface
Lay the phone over the top of the card so that just the fingerprint sensor is visible.
Place and lift your thumb at different angles on your cardâ€™s sensor until you reach 100%.
This card is enrolled. A fingerprint is recorded on this card. Click OK to continue.
This card is not enrolled. No fingerprints are recorded on this card. Click OK to continue.
